summary: Just an armour I made for my adventure in Sostheim that I would like to share with you :)
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION: Adds a combined set of Chitin light and Dragonplate Armour into the game as HEAVY ARMOR. The set has the Chitin Heavy armour
stats and it can be found in the second floor of the Abandoned Building (near the blackmith\'s smithing forge) located in Raven Rock (Solstheim).
It CANNOT be crafted nor is it respawnable so be careful where you leave it. It can however be upgraded in a workbench with a chitin plate for
each part. Also the Steel Smithing perk can double the impovement off the armor.NOTE: It obviously requires DRAGONBORN (DLC) in order to work.




   
   DETAILS ABOUT THE MODEL IN-GAME:

 -Drifter\'s Armor (Chitin Light Armor)
 -Drifter\'s Helmet (Chitin Light Helmet)
 -Drifter\'s Gauntlets (Dragonplate Gauntlets)
 -Drifter\'s Boots (Dragonplate Boots)

  INSTALLATION:
 1.Just put the esp file into your Skyrim\'s DATA folder (located in your Skyrim main installation directory)
 2.Check if the esp\'s box is checked in your launcher\'s DATA FILES
 3.Have fun with your new armour !
                                                                                                                     !ENJOY!

 Please endorse or send me feedback if you liked my little mod :)
                                                                                   
               Also, if you have any new ideas about armor set mixing that fit\'s the 
               Heavy Armor Style of characters, please post anything you wish.
author: DovahkiinTheLast
